```javascriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import {
  TbCalendar,
  TbCoin,
  TbUsers,
  TbTrendingUp,
  TbRefresh,
  TbClock,
  TbReportAnalytics,
  TbPlus,
} from "react-icons/tb";
import { format, startOfMonth, endOfMonth } from "date-fns";
import { apiService } from "../../services/api";
import NotificationModal from "../../components/ui/NotificationModal";
import StatCard from "../../components/ui/StatCard";
import { useStatsCache } from "../../contexts/StatsCacheContext";

// Settlement components
import CommissionBreakdownModal from "../../components/settlement/CommissionBreakdownModal";
import ProcessSettlementModal from "../../components/settlement/ProcessSettlementModal";
import ReportsModal from "../../components/settlement/ReportsModal";
import SettlementTable from "../../components/settlement/SettlementTable";
import PendingPayoutsModal from "../../components/settlement/PendingPayoutsModal";

const SettlementManagementPage = () => {
  const { refreshStats } = useStatsCache();
  const [settlements, setSettlements] = useState([]);
  const [overallStats, setOverallStats] = useState(null);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [selectedSettlement, setSelectedSettlement] = useState(null);
  const [showBreakdown, setShowBreakdown] = useState(false);
  const [commissionBreakdown, setCommissionBreakdown] = useState(null);
  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState({
    startDate: format(startOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    endDate: format(endOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
  });
  const [tempDateRange, setTempDateRange] = useState({
    startDate: format(startOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    endDate: format(endOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
  });
  const [pendingPayouts, setPendingPayouts] = useState([]);
  const [showPayouts, setShowPayouts] = useState(false);
  const [payoutStats, setPayoutStats] = useState(null);
  const [showProcessModal, setShowProcessModal] = useState(false);
  const [showReportsModal, setShowReportsModal] = useState(false);
  const [availableReports, setAvailableReports] = useState([]);
  const [reportsLoading, setReportsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [notification, setNotification] = useState({
    isOpen: false,
    type: "info",
    title: "",
    message: "",
    onConfirm: null,
    onCancel: null,
    showCancel: false,
    confirmText: "Confirm",
    cancelText: "Cancel",
    autoClose: false,
    autoCloseDelay: 3000,
  });

  useEffect(() => {
    loadData();
  }, [dateRange]);

  // Update temp date range when dateRange changes
  useEffect(() => {
    setTempDateRange(dateRange);
  }, [dateRange]);

  // Helper functions for notifications
  const showNotification = (type, title, message, options = {}) => {
    setNotification({
      isOpen: true,
      type,
      title,
      message,
      ...options,
    });
  };

  const closeNotification = () => {
    setNotification({
      isOpen: false,
      type: "info",
      title: "",
      message: "",
      onConfirm: null,
      onCancel: null,
      showCancel: false,
      confirmText: "Confirm",
      cancelText: "Cancel",
      autoClose: false,
      autoCloseDelay: 3000,
    });
  };

  const loadData = async () => {
    try {
      setLoading(true);
      await Promise.all([
        loadSettlements(),
        loadOverallStats(),
        loadPendingPayouts(),
      ]);
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading data:", error);
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Failed to load settlement data", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 3000,
      });
    } finally {
      setLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const loadSettlements = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/summary?startDate=${dateRange.startDate}&endDate=${dateRange.endDate}`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setSettlements(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading settlements:", error);
    }
  };

  const loadOverallStats = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        "/settlements/stats/overall?days=30"
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setOverallStats(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading overall stats:", error);
    }
  };

  const loadPendingPayouts = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get("/settlements/payouts/pending");
      if (response.success) {
        setPendingPayouts(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading pending payouts:", error);
    }
  };

  const generateDailySettlement = async (date) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post("/settlements/generate", {
        date: date,
      });
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Daily settlement generated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadData();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error generating settlement:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to generate settlement",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const processSettlement = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/process`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Settlement processed successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadData();
        setShowProcessModal(false);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error processing settlement:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to process settlement",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const initiatePayouts = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/initiate-payouts`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Commission payouts initiated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadPayoutStatistics(settlementId);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error initiating payouts:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to initiate payouts",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const retryFailedPayouts = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/retry-payouts`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Failed payouts retry initiated",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadPayoutStatistics(settlementId);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error retrying failed payouts:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to retry payouts",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const loadPayoutStatistics = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/payout-statistics`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setPayoutStats(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading payout statistics:", error);
    }
  };

  const generateReport = async (params) => {
    try {
      setReportsLoading(true);
      let endpoint = "";
      let requestParams = {};

      switch (params.type) {
        case "daily":
          endpoint = `/settlements/${params.settlementId}/report/daily`;
          break;
        case "monthly":
          endpoint = `/settlements/report/monthly/${params.year}/${params.month}`;
          break;
        case "payout":
          endpoint = "/settlements/report/payout";
          requestParams = {
            startDate: params.startDate,
            endDate: params.endDate,
            ...(params.recipientType && {
              recipientType: params.recipientType,
            }),
          };
          break;
      }

      const response = await apiService.get(endpoint, {
        params: requestParams,
      });
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Report generated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadAvailableReports();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error generating report:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to generate report",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    } finally {
      setReportsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const loadAvailableReports = async () => {
    try {
      setReportsLoading(true);
      const response = await apiService.get("/settlements/reports");
      if (response.success) {
        setAvailableReports(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading available reports:", error);
    } finally {
      setReportsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const downloadReport = async (fileName) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/reports/download/${fileName}`,
        { responseType: "blob" }
      );

      // Create blob link to download
      const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data]));
      const link = document.createElement("a");
      link.href = url;
      link.setAttribute("download", fileName);
      document.body.appendChild(link);
      link.click();
      link.remove();
      window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

      showNotification("success", "Success", "Report downloaded successfully", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 3000,
      });
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error downloading report:", error);
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Failed to download report", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
    }
  };

  const handleProcessSettlement = async (settlement) => {
    if (!settlement.id) {
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        "Invalid settlement data - missing settlement ID",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
      return;
    }

    setSelectedSettlement(settlement);
    await loadPayoutStatistics(settlement.id);
    setShowProcessModal(true);
  };


  const viewCommissionBreakdown = async (settlementId) => {
    if (!settlementId) {
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Invalid settlement ID provided", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
      return;
    }

    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/breakdown`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setCommissionBreakdown(response.data);
        setSelectedSettlement(settlementId);
        setShowBreakdown(true);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading commission breakdown:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        "Failed to load commission breakdown",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const markPayoutAsProcessed = async (payoutId, transactionReference) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/payouts/${payoutId}/process`,
        {
          transactionReference,
          paymentMethod: "mpesa",
        }
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification("success", "Success", "Payout marked as processed", {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 3000,
        });
        loadPendingPayouts();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error marking payout as processed:", error);
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Failed to mark payout as processed", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
    }
  };

  const formatCurrency = (amount) => {
    return new Intl.NumberFormat("en-KE", {
      style: "currency",
      currency: "KES",
      minimumFractionDigits: 2,
    }).format(amount);
  };


  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-4 border-primary-600 dark:border-primary-500"></div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <>
      <div className="min-h-screen">
        {/* Header */}
        <div className="mb-8">
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-secondary-600 dark:text-white">
                Settlement Management
              </h1>
              <div className="w-0.5 h-6 ml-3 bg-slate-400 rounded-full"></div>
              <p className="ml-3 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 text-sm">
                Manage daily settlements, commissions, and payouts
                {settlements.length > 0 && (
                  <span className="ml-2 text-primary-600 dark:text-primary-400 font-medium">
                    ({settlements.length} settlements)
                  </span>
                )}
              </p>
            </div>
            <div className="flex space-x-3">
              <button
                onClick={() => setShowReportsModal(true)}
                className="inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-full text-white bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700"
              >
                <TbReportAnalytics className="w-5 h-5 mr-2" />
                Reports
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  loadData();
                  refreshStats("settlementStats", () =>
                    apiService.get("/settlements/stats/overall")
                  );
                }}
                className="inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-full text-white bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700"
              >
                <TbRefresh className="w-5 h-5 mr-2" />
                Refresh Data
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Stats Cards */}
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 m-6 mb-0">
          <StatCard
            title="Total Collected (30d)"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalCollected)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Total collections in last 30 days"
            subtitleColor="text-green-600 dark:text-green-500"
            icon={<TbCoin size={34} />}
            gradient="from-green-500 to-green-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="SHA Amount"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalShaAmount)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Total SHA portion"
            subtitleColor="text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-500"
            icon={<TbTrendingUp size={32} />}
            gradient="from-blue-500 to-blue-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="Total Commissions"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalCommissions)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Delegate & coordinator commissions"
            subtitleColor="text-purple-600 dark:text-purple-500"
            icon={<TbUsers size={32} />}
            gradient="from-purple-500 to-purple-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="Avg Per Day"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.averagePerDay)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Average daily collections"
            subtitleColor="text-orange-600 dark:text-orange-500"
            icon={<TbCalendar size={32} />}
            gradient="from-orange-500 to-orange-600"
          />
        </div>

        {/* Main Content */}
        <div className="m-6 p-4 backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 dark:bg-gray-800/70 rounded-[1.5rem] border border-white/30 dark:border-gray-700/30 shadow-xl shadow-blue-500/5 dark:shadow-gray-900/20">
          {/* Toolbar */}
          <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row lg:items-center lg:justify-between gap-4 mb-6">
            {/* Left Side Section - Table Info */}
            <div className="flex items-center gap-3 text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-300 min-w-[30rem]">
              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                <span className="text-lg font-lexend font-semibold text-secondary-600 dark:text-secondary-400 whitespace-nowrap">
                  Daily Settlements
                </span>
              </div>
              <div className="h-6 border-l border-slate-300/70 dark:border-slate-600/70"></div>
              <p className="text-sm text-slate-500 dark:text-slate-400 font-lexend">
                Manage daily settlements and commission payouts
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Right Side Section - Actions */}
            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-start sm:items-center gap-3 flex-1 md:max-w-[50%] min-w-0">
              

            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Date Range Filter */}
          <div className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow p-6 mb-6">
            <h3 className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4">
              Filter by Date Range
            </h3>
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
              <div>
                <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
                  Start Date
                </label>
                <input
                  type="date"
                  value={dateRange.startDate}
                  onChange={(e) =>
                    setDateRange({ ...dateRange, startDate: e.target.value })
                  }
                  className="mt-1 block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:text-white"
                />
              </div>
              <div>
                <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
                  End Date
                </label>
                <input
                  type="date"
                  value={dateRange.endDate}
                  onChange={(e) =>
                    setDateRange({ ...dateRange, endDate: e.target.value })
                  }
                  className="mt-1 block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:text-white"
                />
              </div>
              <div className="flex items-end">
                <button
                  onClick={loadData}
                  className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-primary-500"
                >
                  Apply Filter
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Generate Settlement for Today */}
          <div className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow p-6 mt-6">
            <h3 className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4">
              Generate Settlement
            </h3>
            <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
              <input
                type="date"
                className="block w-64 border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:text-white"
                onChange={(e) => {
                  if (e.target.value) {
                    generateDailySettlement(e.target.value);
                  }
                }}
              />
              <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
                Select a date to generate settlement for that day
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>
          </div>

          {/* Settlements Table */}
          <SettlementTable
            settlements={settlements}
            loading={loading}
            formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
            onViewBreakdown={viewCommissionBreakdown}
            onProcessSettlement={handleProcessSettlement}
            onGenerateReport={(settlementId) =>
              generateReport({ type: "daily", settlementId })
            }
          />

          
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Commission Breakdown Modal */}
      <CommissionBreakdownModal
        isOpen={showBreakdown}
        onClose={() => setShowBreakdown(false)}
        commissionBreakdown={commissionBreakdown}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
      />

      {/* Process Settlement Modal */}
      <ProcessSettlementModal
        isOpen={showProcessModal}
        onClose={() => setShowProcessModal(false)}
        settlement={selectedSettlement}
        payoutStats={payoutStats}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
        onProcessSettlement={processSettlement}
        onInitiatePayouts={initiatePayouts}
        onRetryFailedPayouts={retryFailedPayouts}
        loading={loading}
      />

      {/* Reports Modal */}
      <ReportsModal
        isOpen={showReportsModal}
        onClose={() => setShowReportsModal(false)}
        availableReports={availableReports}
        onLoadReports={loadAvailableReports}
        onDownloadReport={downloadReport}
        onGenerateReport={generateReport}
        loading={reportsLoading}
      />

      {/* Pending Payouts Modal */}
      <PendingPayoutsModal
        isOpen={showPayouts}
        onClose={() => setShowPayouts(false)}
        pendingPayouts={pendingPayouts}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
        onMarkPayoutAsProcessed={markPayoutAsProcessed}
        loading={loading}
      />

      {/* Notification Modal */}
      <NotificationModal
        isOpen={notification.isOpen}
        onClose={closeNotification}
        type={notification.type}
        title={notification.title}
        message={notification.message}
        confirmText={notification.confirmText}
        cancelText={notification.cancelText}
        onConfirm={notification.onConfirm}
        onCancel={notification.onCancel}
        showCancel={notification.showCancel}
        autoClose={notification.autoClose}
        autoCloseDelay={notification.autoCloseDelay}
      />
    </>
  );
};

export default SettlementManagementPage;
```

```javascriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import {
  TbCalendar,
  TbCoin,
  TbUsers,
  TbTrendingUp,
  TbRefresh,
  TbClock,
  TbReportAnalytics,
  TbPlus,
} from "react-icons/tb";
import { format, startOfMonth, endOfMonth } from "date-fns";
import { apiService } from "../../services/api";
import NotificationModal from "../../components/ui/NotificationModal";
import StatCard from "../../components/ui/StatCard";
import { useStatsCache } from "../../contexts/StatsCacheContext";

// Settlement components
import CommissionBreakdownModal from "../../components/settlement/CommissionBreakdownModal";
import ProcessSettlementModal from "../../components/settlement/ProcessSettlementModal";
import ReportsModal from "../../components/settlement/ReportsModal";
import SettlementTable from "../../components/settlement/SettlementTable";
import PendingPayoutsModal from "../../components/settlement/PendingPayoutsModal";

const SettlementManagementPage = () => {
  const { refreshStats } = useStatsCache();
  const [settlements, setSettlements] = useState([]);
  const [overallStats, setOverallStats] = useState(null);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [selectedSettlement, setSelectedSettlement] = useState(null);
  const [showBreakdown, setShowBreakdown] = useState(false);
  const [commissionBreakdown, setCommissionBreakdown] = useState(null);
  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState({
    startDate: format(startOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    endDate: format(endOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
  });
  const [tempDateRange, setTempDateRange] = useState({
    startDate: format(startOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    endDate: format(endOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
  });
  const [pendingPayouts, setPendingPayouts] = useState([]);
  const [showPayouts, setShowPayouts] = useState(false);
  const [payoutStats, setPayoutStats] = useState(null);
  const [showProcessModal, setShowProcessModal] = useState(false);
  const [showReportsModal, setShowReportsModal] = useState(false);
  const [availableReports, setAvailableReports] = useState([]);
  const [reportsLoading, setReportsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [notification, setNotification] = useState({
    isOpen: false,
    type: "info",
    title: "",
    message: "",
    onConfirm: null,
    onCancel: null,
    showCancel: false,
    confirmText: "Confirm",
    cancelText: "Cancel",
    autoClose: false,
    autoCloseDelay: 3000,
  });

  useEffect(() => {
    loadData();
  }, [dateRange]);

  // Update temp date range when dateRange changes
  useEffect(() => {
    setTempDateRange(dateRange);
  }, [dateRange]);

  // Helper functions for notifications
  const showNotification = (type, title, message, options = {}) => {
    setNotification({
      isOpen: true,
      type,
      title,
      message,
      ...options,
    });
  };

  const closeNotification = () => {
    setNotification({
      isOpen: false,
      type: "info",
      title: "",
      message: "",
      onConfirm: null,
      onCancel: null,
      showCancel: false,
      confirmText: "Confirm",
      cancelText: "Cancel",
      autoClose: false,
      autoCloseDelay: 3000,
    });
  };

  const applyDateFilter = () => {
    setDateRange(tempDateRange);
  };

  const resetDateFilter = () => {
    const currentMonth = {
      startDate: format(startOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
      endDate: format(endOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    };
    setTempDateRange(currentMonth);
    setDateRange(currentMonth);
  };

  const loadSettlements = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/summary?startDate=${dateRange.startDate}&endDate=${dateRange.endDate}`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setSettlements(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading settlements:", error);
    }
  };

  const loadOverallStats = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        "/settlements/stats/overall?days=30"
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setOverallStats(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading overall stats:", error);
    }
  };

  const loadPendingPayouts = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get("/settlements/payouts/pending");
      if (response.success) {
        setPendingPayouts(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading pending payouts:", error);
    }
  };

  const generateDailySettlement = async (date) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post("/settlements/generate", {
        date: date,
      });
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Daily settlement generated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadData();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error generating settlement:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to generate settlement",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const processSettlement = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/process`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Settlement processed successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadData();
        setShowProcessModal(false);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error processing settlement:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to process settlement",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const initiatePayouts = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/initiate-payouts`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Commission payouts initiated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadPayoutStatistics(settlementId);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error initiating payouts:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to initiate payouts",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const retryFailedPayouts = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/retry-payouts`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Failed payouts retry initiated",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadPayoutStatistics(settlementId);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error retrying failed payouts:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to retry payouts",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const loadPayoutStatistics = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/payout-statistics`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setPayoutStats(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading payout statistics:", error);
    }
  };

  const generateReport = async (params) => {
    try {
      setReportsLoading(true);
      let endpoint = "";
      let requestParams = {};

      switch (params.type) {
        case "daily":
          endpoint = `/settlements/${params.settlementId}/report/daily`;
          break;
        case "monthly":
          endpoint = `/settlements/report/monthly/${params.year}/${params.month}`;
          break;
        case "payout":
          endpoint = "/settlements/report/payout";
          requestParams = {
            startDate: params.startDate,
            endDate: params.endDate,
            ...(params.recipientType && {
              recipientType: params.recipientType,
            }),
          };
          break;
      }

      const response = await apiService.get(endpoint, {
        params: requestParams,
      });
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Report generated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadAvailableReports();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error generating report:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to generate report",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    } finally {
      setReportsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const loadAvailableReports = async () => {
    try {
      setReportsLoading(true);
      const response = await apiService.get("/settlements/reports");
      if (response.success) {
        setAvailableReports(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading available reports:", error);
    } finally {
      setReportsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const downloadReport = async (fileName) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/reports/download/${fileName}`,
        { responseType: "blob" }
      );

      // Create blob link to download
      const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data]));
      const link = document.createElement("a");
      link.href = url;
      link.setAttribute("download", fileName);
      document.body.appendChild(link);
      link.click();
      link.remove();
      window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

      showNotification("success", "Success", "Report downloaded successfully", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 3000,
      });
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error downloading report:", error);
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Failed to download report", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
    }
  };

  const handleProcessSettlement = async (settlement) => {
    if (!settlement.id) {
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        "Invalid settlement data - missing settlement ID",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
      return;
    }

    setSelectedSettlement(settlement);
    await loadPayoutStatistics(settlement.id);
    setShowProcessModal(true);
  };


  const viewCommissionBreakdown = async (settlementId) => {
    if (!settlementId) {
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Invalid settlement ID provided", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
      return;
    }

    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/breakdown`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setCommissionBreakdown(response.data);
        setSelectedSettlement(settlementId);
        setShowBreakdown(true);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading commission breakdown:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        "Failed to load commission breakdown",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const markPayoutAsProcessed = async (payoutId, transactionReference) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/payouts/${payoutId}/process`,
        {
          transactionReference,
          paymentMethod: "mpesa",
        }
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification("success", "Success", "Payout marked as processed", {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 3000,
        });
        loadPendingPayouts();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error marking payout as processed:", error);
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Failed to mark payout as processed", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
    }
  };

  const formatCurrency = (amount) => {
    return new Intl.NumberFormat("en-KE", {
      style: "currency",
      currency: "KES",
      minimumFractionDigits: 2,
    }).format(amount);
  };


  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-4 border-primary-600 dark:border-primary-500"></div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <>
      <div className="min-h-screen">
        {/* Header */}
        <div className="mb-8">
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-secondary-600 dark:text-white">
                Settlement Management
              </h1>
              <div className="w-0.5 h-6 ml-3 bg-slate-400 rounded-full"></div>
              <p className="ml-3 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 text-sm">
                Manage daily settlements, commissions, and payouts
                {settlements.length > 0 && (
                  <span className="ml-2 text-primary-600 dark:text-primary-400 font-medium">
                    ({settlements.length} settlements)
                  </span>
                )}
              </p>
            </div>
            <div className="flex space-x-3">
              <button
                onClick={() => setShowReportsModal(true)}
                className="inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-full text-white bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700"
              >
                <TbReportAnalytics className="w-5 h-5 mr-2" />
                Reports
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  loadData();
                  refreshStats("settlementStats", () =>
                    apiService.get("/settlements/stats/overall")
                  );
                }}
                className="inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-full text-white bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700"
              >
                <TbRefresh className="w-5 h-5 mr-2" />
                Refresh Data
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Stats Cards */}
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 m-6 mb-0">
          <StatCard
            title="Total Collected (30d)"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalCollected)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Total collections in last 30 days"
            subtitleColor="text-green-600 dark:text-green-500"
            icon={<TbCoin size={34} />}
            gradient="from-green-500 to-green-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="SHA Amount"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalShaAmount)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Total SHA portion"
            subtitleColor="text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-500"
            icon={<TbTrendingUp size={32} />}
            gradient="from-blue-500 to-blue-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="Total Commissions"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalCommissions)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Delegate & coordinator commissions"
            subtitleColor="text-purple-600 dark:text-purple-500"
            icon={<TbUsers size={32} />}
            gradient="from-purple-500 to-purple-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="Avg Per Day"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.averagePerDay)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Average daily collections"
            subtitleColor="text-orange-600 dark:text-orange-500"
            icon={<TbCalendar size={32} />}
            gradient="from-orange-500 to-orange-600"
          />
        </div>

        {/* Main Content */}
        <div className="m-6 p-4 backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 dark:bg-gray-800/70 rounded-[1.5rem] border border-white/30 dark:border-gray-700/30 shadow-xl shadow-blue-500/5 dark:shadow-gray-900/20">
          {/* Toolbar */}
          <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row lg:items-center lg:justify-between gap-4 mb-6">
            {/* Left Side Section - Table Info */}
            <div className="flex items-center gap-3 text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-300 min-w-[30rem]">
              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                <span className="text-lg font-lexend font-semibold text-secondary-600 dark:text-secondary-400 whitespace-nowrap">
                  Daily Settlements
                </span>
              </div>
              <div className="h-6 border-l border-slate-300/70 dark:border-slate-600/70"></div>
              <p className="text-sm text-slate-500 dark:text-slate-400 font-lexend">
                Manage daily settlements and commission payouts
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Right Side Section - Actions */}
            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-start sm:items-center gap-3 flex-1 md:max-w-[50%] min-w-0">
              

            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Date Range Filter */}
          <div className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow p-6 mb-6">
            <h3 className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4">
              Filter by Date Range
            </h3>
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
              <div>
                <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
                  Start Date
                </label>
                <input
                  type="date"
                  value={dateRange.startDate}
                  onChange={(e) =>
                    setDateRange({ ...dateRange, startDate: e.target.value })
                  }
                  className="mt-1 block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:text-white"
                />
              </div>
              <div>
                <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">
                  End Date
                </label>
                <input
                  type="date"
                  value={dateRange.endDate}
                  onChange={(e) =>
                    setDateRange({ ...dateRange, endDate: e.target.value })
                  }
                  className="mt-1 block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:text-white"
                />
              </div>
              <div className="flex items-end">
                <button
                  onClick={loadData}
                  className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-md text-white bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-primary-500"
                >
                  Apply Filter
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Generate Settlement for Today */}
          <div className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg shadow p-6 mt-6">
            <h3 className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4">
              Generate Settlement
            </h3>
            <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
              <input
                type="date"
                className="block w-64 border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-primary-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:border-gray-600 dark:text-white"
                onChange={(e) => {
                  if (e.target.value) {
                    generateDailySettlement(e.target.value);
                  }
                }}
              />
              <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
                Select a date to generate settlement for that day
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>
          </div>

          {/* Settlements Table */}
          <SettlementTable
            settlements={settlements}
            loading={loading}
            formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
            onViewBreakdown={viewCommissionBreakdown}
            onProcessSettlement={handleProcessSettlement}
            onGenerateReport={(settlementId) =>
              generateReport({ type: "daily", settlementId })
            }
          />

          
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Commission Breakdown Modal */}
      <CommissionBreakdownModal
        isOpen={showBreakdown}
        onClose={() => setShowBreakdown(false)}
        commissionBreakdown={commissionBreakdown}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
      />

      {/* Process Settlement Modal */}
      <ProcessSettlementModal
        isOpen={showProcessModal}
        onClose={() => setShowProcessModal(false)}
        settlement={selectedSettlement}
        payoutStats={payoutStats}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
        onProcessSettlement={processSettlement}
        onInitiatePayouts={initiatePayouts}
        onRetryFailedPayouts={retryFailedPayouts}
        loading={loading}
      />

      {/* Reports Modal */}
      <ReportsModal
        isOpen={showReportsModal}
        onClose={() => setShowReportsModal(false)}
        availableReports={availableReports}
        onLoadReports={loadAvailableReports}
        onDownloadReport={downloadReport}
        onGenerateReport={generateReport}
        loading={reportsLoading}
      />

      {/* Pending Payouts Modal */}
      <PendingPayoutsModal
        isOpen={showPayouts}
        onClose={() => setShowPayouts(false)}
        pendingPayouts={pendingPayouts}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
        onMarkPayoutAsProcessed={markPayoutAsProcessed}
        loading={loading}
      />

      {/* Notification Modal */}
      <NotificationModal
        isOpen={notification.isOpen}
        onClose={closeNotification}
        type={notification.type}
        title={notification.title}
        message={notification.message}
        confirmText={notification.confirmText}
        cancelText={notification.cancelText}
        onConfirm={notification.onConfirm}
        onCancel={notification.onCancel}
        showCancel={notification.showCancel}
        autoClose={notification.autoClose}
        autoCloseDelay={notification.autoCloseDelay}
      />
    </>
  );
};

export default SettlementManagementPage;

```

```javascriptreact
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react";
import { motion } from "framer-motion";
import {
  TbCalendar,
  TbCoin,
  TbUsers,
  TbTrendingUp,
  TbRefresh,
  TbClock,
  TbReportAnalytics,
  TbPlus,
} from "react-icons/tb";
import { format, startOfMonth, endOfMonth } from "date-fns";
import { apiService } from "../../services/api";
import NotificationModal from "../../components/ui/NotificationModal";
import StatCard from "../../components/ui/StatCard";
import { useStatsCache } from "../../contexts/StatsCacheContext";

// Settlement components
import CommissionBreakdownModal from "../../components/settlement/CommissionBreakdownModal";
import ProcessSettlementModal from "../../components/settlement/ProcessSettlementModal";
import ReportsModal from "../../components/settlement/ReportsModal";
import SettlementTable from "../../components/settlement/SettlementTable";
import PendingPayoutsModal from "../../components/settlement/PendingPayoutsModal";

const SettlementManagementPage = () => {
  const { refreshStats } = useStatsCache();
  const [settlements, setSettlements] = useState([]);
  const [overallStats, setOverallStats] = useState(null);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [selectedSettlement, setSelectedSettlement] = useState(null);
  const [showBreakdown, setShowBreakdown] = useState(false);
  const [commissionBreakdown, setCommissionBreakdown] = useState(null);
  const [dateRange, setDateRange] = useState({
    startDate: format(startOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    endDate: format(endOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
  });
  const [tempDateRange, setTempDateRange] = useState({
    startDate: format(startOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    endDate: format(endOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
  });
  const [pendingPayouts, setPendingPayouts] = useState([]);
  const [showPayouts, setShowPayouts] = useState(false);
  const [payoutStats, setPayoutStats] = useState(null);
  const [showProcessModal, setShowProcessModal] = useState(false);
  const [showReportsModal, setShowReportsModal] = useState(false);
  const [availableReports, setAvailableReports] = useState([]);
  const [reportsLoading, setReportsLoading] = useState(false);
  const [notification, setNotification] = useState({
    isOpen: false,
    type: "info",
    title: "",
    message: "",
    onConfirm: null,
    onCancel: null,
    showCancel: false,
    confirmText: "Confirm",
    cancelText: "Cancel",
    autoClose: false,
    autoCloseDelay: 3000,
  });

  useEffect(() => {
    loadData();
  }, [dateRange]);

  // Update temp date range when dateRange changes
  useEffect(() => {
    setTempDateRange(dateRange);
  }, [dateRange]);

  // Helper functions for notifications
  const showNotification = (type, title, message, options = {}) => {
    setNotification({
      isOpen: true,
      type,
      title,
      message,
      ...options,
    });
  };

  const closeNotification = () => {
    setNotification({
      isOpen: false,
      type: "info",
      title: "",
      message: "",
      onConfirm: null,
      onCancel: null,
      showCancel: false,
      confirmText: "Confirm",
      cancelText: "Cancel",
      autoClose: false,
      autoCloseDelay: 3000,
    });
  };

  const applyDateFilter = () => {
    setDateRange(tempDateRange);
  };

  const resetDateFilter = () => {
    const currentMonth = {
      startDate: format(startOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
      endDate: format(endOfMonth(new Date()), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    };
    setTempDateRange(currentMonth);
    setDateRange(currentMonth);
  };

  const loadSettlements = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/summary?startDate=${dateRange.startDate}&endDate=${dateRange.endDate}`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setSettlements(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading settlements:", error);
    }
  };

  const loadOverallStats = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        "/settlements/stats/overall?days=30"
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setOverallStats(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading overall stats:", error);
    }
  };

  const loadPendingPayouts = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get("/settlements/payouts/pending");
      if (response.success) {
        setPendingPayouts(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading pending payouts:", error);
    }
  };

  const generateDailySettlement = async (date) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post("/settlements/generate", {
        date: date,
      });
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Daily settlement generated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadData();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error generating settlement:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to generate settlement",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const processSettlement = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/process`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Settlement processed successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadData();
        setShowProcessModal(false);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error processing settlement:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to process settlement",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const initiatePayouts = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/initiate-payouts`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Commission payouts initiated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadPayoutStatistics(settlementId);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error initiating payouts:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to initiate payouts",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const retryFailedPayouts = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/retry-payouts`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Failed payouts retry initiated",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadPayoutStatistics(settlementId);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error retrying failed payouts:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to retry payouts",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const loadPayoutStatistics = async (settlementId) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/payout-statistics`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setPayoutStats(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading payout statistics:", error);
    }
  };

  const generateReport = async (params) => {
    try {
      setReportsLoading(true);
      let endpoint = "";
      let requestParams = {};

      switch (params.type) {
        case "daily":
          endpoint = `/settlements/${params.settlementId}/report/daily`;
          break;
        case "monthly":
          endpoint = `/settlements/report/monthly/${params.year}/${params.month}`;
          break;
        case "payout":
          endpoint = "/settlements/report/payout";
          requestParams = {
            startDate: params.startDate,
            endDate: params.endDate,
            ...(params.recipientType && {
              recipientType: params.recipientType,
            }),
          };
          break;
      }

      const response = await apiService.get(endpoint, {
        params: requestParams,
      });
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification(
          "success",
          "Success",
          "Report generated successfully",
          {
            autoClose: true,
            autoCloseDelay: 3000,
          }
        );
        loadAvailableReports();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error generating report:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        error.response?.data?.error?.message || "Failed to generate report",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    } finally {
      setReportsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const loadAvailableReports = async () => {
    try {
      setReportsLoading(true);
      const response = await apiService.get("/settlements/reports");
      if (response.success) {
        setAvailableReports(response.data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading available reports:", error);
    } finally {
      setReportsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  const downloadReport = async (fileName) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/reports/download/${fileName}`,
        { responseType: "blob" }
      );

      // Create blob link to download
      const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(new Blob([response.data]));
      const link = document.createElement("a");
      link.href = url;
      link.setAttribute("download", fileName);
      document.body.appendChild(link);
      link.click();
      link.remove();
      window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

      showNotification("success", "Success", "Report downloaded successfully", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 3000,
      });
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error downloading report:", error);
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Failed to download report", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
    }
  };

  const handleProcessSettlement = async (settlement) => {
    if (!settlement.id) {
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        "Invalid settlement data - missing settlement ID",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
      return;
    }

    setSelectedSettlement(settlement);
    await loadPayoutStatistics(settlement.id);
    setShowProcessModal(true);
  };


  const viewCommissionBreakdown = async (settlementId) => {
    if (!settlementId) {
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Invalid settlement ID provided", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
      return;
    }

    try {
      const response = await apiService.get(
        `/settlements/${settlementId}/breakdown`
      );
      if (response.success) {
        setCommissionBreakdown(response.data);
        setSelectedSettlement(settlementId);
        setShowBreakdown(true);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error loading commission breakdown:", error);
      showNotification(
        "error",
        "Error",
        "Failed to load commission breakdown",
        {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 5000,
        }
      );
    }
  };

  const markPayoutAsProcessed = async (payoutId, transactionReference) => {
    try {
      const response = await apiService.post(
        `/settlements/payouts/${payoutId}/process`,
        {
          transactionReference,
          paymentMethod: "mpesa",
        }
      );
      if (response.success) {
        showNotification("success", "Success", "Payout marked as processed", {
          autoClose: true,
          autoCloseDelay: 3000,
        });
        loadPendingPayouts();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error marking payout as processed:", error);
      showNotification("error", "Error", "Failed to mark payout as processed", {
        autoClose: true,
        autoCloseDelay: 5000,
      });
    }
  };

  const formatCurrency = (amount) => {
    return new Intl.NumberFormat("en-KE", {
      style: "currency",
      currency: "KES",
      minimumFractionDigits: 2,
    }).format(amount);
  };


  if (loading) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-b-4 border-primary-600 dark:border-primary-500"></div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <>
      <div className="min-h-screen">
        {/* Header */}
        <div className="mb-8">
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
            <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
              <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-secondary-600 dark:text-white">
                Settlement Management
              </h1>
              <div className="w-0.5 h-6 ml-3 bg-slate-400 rounded-full"></div>
              <p className="ml-3 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 text-sm">
                Manage daily settlements, commissions, and payouts
                {settlements.length > 0 && (
                  <span className="ml-2 text-primary-600 dark:text-primary-400 font-medium">
                    ({settlements.length} settlements)
                  </span>
                )}
              </p>
            </div>
            <div className="flex space-x-3">
              <button
                onClick={() => setShowReportsModal(true)}
                className="inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-full text-white bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700"
              >
                <TbReportAnalytics className="w-5 h-5 mr-2" />
                Reports
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={() => {
                  loadData();
                  refreshStats("settlementStats", () =>
                    apiService.get("/settlements/stats/overall")
                  );
                }}
                className="inline-flex items-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-full text-white bg-primary-600 hover:bg-primary-700"
              >
                <TbRefresh className="w-5 h-5 mr-2" />
                Refresh Data
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Stats Cards */}
        <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 m-6 mb-0">
          <StatCard
            title="Total Collected (30d)"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalCollected)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Total collections in last 30 days"
            subtitleColor="text-green-600 dark:text-green-500"
            icon={<TbCoin size={34} />}
            gradient="from-green-500 to-green-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="SHA Amount"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalShaAmount)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Total SHA portion"
            subtitleColor="text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-500"
            icon={<TbTrendingUp size={32} />}
            gradient="from-blue-500 to-blue-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="Total Commissions"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.totalCommissions)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Delegate & coordinator commissions"
            subtitleColor="text-purple-600 dark:text-purple-500"
            icon={<TbUsers size={32} />}
            gradient="from-purple-500 to-purple-600"
          />
          <StatCard
            title="Avg Per Day"
            value={
              overallStats
                ? formatCurrency(overallStats.averagePerDay)
                : "KES 0.00"
            }
            subtitle="Average daily collections"
            subtitleColor="text-orange-600 dark:text-orange-500"
            icon={<TbCalendar size={32} />}
            gradient="from-orange-500 to-orange-600"
          />
        </div>

        {/* Main Content */}
        <div className="m-6 p-4 backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 dark:bg-gray-800/70 rounded-[1.5rem] border border-white/30 dark:border-gray-700/30 shadow-xl shadow-blue-500/5 dark:shadow-gray-900/20">
          {/* Toolbar */}
          <div className="flex flex-col lg:flex-row lg:items-center lg:justify-between gap-4 mb-6">
            {/* Left Side Section - Table Info */}
            <div className="flex items-center gap-3 text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-300 min-w-[30rem]">
              <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
                <span className="text-lg font-lexend font-semibold text-secondary-600 dark:text-secondary-400 whitespace-nowrap">
                  Daily Settlements
                </span>
              </div>
              <div className="h-6 border-l border-slate-300/70 dark:border-slate-600/70"></div>
              <p className="text-sm text-slate-500 dark:text-slate-400 font-lexend">
                Manage daily settlements and commission payouts
              </p>
            </div>

            {/* Right Side Section - Actions */}
            <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-start sm:items-center gap-3 flex-1 md:max-w-[50%] min-w-0">
              

            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Controls Section */}
          <div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6">
            {/* Date Range Filter */}
            <div className="bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-50 to-blue-100 dark:from-blue-900/20 dark:to-blue-800/20 rounded-2xl p-6 border border-blue-200 dark:border-blue-700/30">
              <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4 flex items-center">
                <TbCalendar className="w-5 h-5 mr-2 text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400" />
                Filter by Date Range
              </h3>
              <div className="space-y-4">
                <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4">
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-2">
                      Start Date
                    </label>
                    <input
                      type="date"
                      value={tempDateRange.startDate}
                      onChange={(e) =>
                        setTempDateRange({ ...tempDateRange, startDate: e.target.value })
                      }
                      className="block w-full px-4 py-2.5 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-xl shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-white transition-colors"
                    />
                  </div>
                  <div>
                    <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-2">
                      End Date
                    </label>
                    <input
                      type="date"
                      value={tempDateRange.endDate}
                      onChange={(e) =>
                        setTempDateRange({ ...tempDateRange, endDate: e.target.value })
                      }
                      className="block w-full px-4 py-2.5 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-xl shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-white transition-colors"
                    />
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div className="flex space-x-3">
                  <button
                    onClick={applyDateFilter}
                    className="flex-1 px-4 py-2.5 bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-blue-700 hover:from-blue-700 hover:to-blue-800 text-white font-semibold rounded-xl transition-all duration-300 shadow-lg shadow-blue-500/25"
                  >
                    Apply Filter
                  </button>
                  <button
                    onClick={resetDateFilter}
                    className="px-4 py-2.5 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-600 rounded-xl transition-colors font-semibold"
                  >
                    Reset
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>

            {/* Generate Settlement */}
            <div className="bg-gradient-to-r from-green-50 to-green-100 dark:from-green-900/20 dark:to-green-800/20 rounded-2xl p-6 border border-green-200 dark:border-green-700/30">
              <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-4 flex items-center">
                <TbPlus className="w-5 h-5 mr-2 text-green-600 dark:text-green-400" />
                Generate Settlement
              </h3>
              <div className="space-y-4">
                <div>
                  <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-2">
                    Select Date
                  </label>
                  <input
                    type="date"
                    className="block w-full px-4 py-2.5 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-xl shadow-sm focus:ring-green-500 focus:border-green-500 dark:bg-gray-700 dark:text-white transition-colors"
                    onChange={(e) => {
                      if (e.target.value) {
                        generateDailySettlement(e.target.value);
                      }
                    }}
                  />
                </div>
                <p className="text-sm text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
                  Select a date to generate settlement for that day
                </p>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Settlements Table */}
          <SettlementTable
            settlements={settlements}
            loading={loading}
            formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
            onViewBreakdown={viewCommissionBreakdown}
            onProcessSettlement={handleProcessSettlement}
            onGenerateReport={(settlementId) =>
              generateReport({ type: "daily", settlementId })
            }
          />

          
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Commission Breakdown Modal */}
      <CommissionBreakdownModal
        isOpen={showBreakdown}
        onClose={() => setShowBreakdown(false)}
        commissionBreakdown={commissionBreakdown}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
      />

      {/* Process Settlement Modal */}
      <ProcessSettlementModal
        isOpen={showProcessModal}
        onClose={() => setShowProcessModal(false)}
        settlement={selectedSettlement}
        payoutStats={payoutStats}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
        onProcessSettlement={processSettlement}
        onInitiatePayouts={initiatePayouts}
        onRetryFailedPayouts={retryFailedPayouts}
        loading={loading}
      />

      {/* Reports Modal */}
      <ReportsModal
        isOpen={showReportsModal}
        onClose={() => setShowReportsModal(false)}
        availableReports={availableReports}
        onLoadReports={loadAvailableReports}
        onDownloadReport={downloadReport}
        onGenerateReport={generateReport}
        loading={reportsLoading}
      />

      {/* Pending Payouts Modal */}
      <PendingPayoutsModal
        isOpen={showPayouts}
        onClose={() => setShowPayouts(false)}
        pendingPayouts={pendingPayouts}
        formatCurrency={formatCurrency}
        onMarkPayoutAsProcessed={markPayoutAsProcessed}
        loading={loading}
      />

      {/* Notification Modal */}
      <NotificationModal
        isOpen={notification.isOpen}
        onClose={closeNotification}
        type={notification.type}
        title={notification.title}
        message={notification.message}
        confirmText={notification.confirmText}
        cancelText={notification.cancelText}
        onConfirm={notification.onConfirm}
        onCancel={notification.onCancel}
        showCancel={notification.showCancel}
        autoClose={notification.autoClose}
        autoCloseDelay={notification.autoCloseDelay}
      />
    </>
  );
};

export default SettlementManagementPage;
```
